# Day 3 Computations

## Switch statements

```{r}
house_type <- "single"
#create switch absed on value do diffferent thigns 

switch(house_type,
       "single" = print("400"), 
       "double" = print ("750"),
       "whole" = print ("1100"))
       
if(house_type == "whole") {
  print("110")
  } else if (house_type == "double") {
    print("750")
  } else if (house_type == "single") {
    print("400")
  }
  
```
